title: Raising Voices to Combat Climate Change
itunes:title: Raising Voices to Combat Climate Change
description:
Katharine Hayhoe, Chief Scientist for The Nature Conservancy, discusses her book "Saving Us: A Climate Scientist's Case for Hope and Healing in a Divided World."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Ed Ludlow. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
